statements: DELETE FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices WHERE id = 1 AND crop_name = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices WHERE farming_method = 'Organic' AND crop_rotation_period > 3;
DELETE FROM OrganicFarming WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM CropRotation WHERE id = 1 AND crop_name = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM OrganicFarming WHERE certification_status = TRUE AND certification_agency = 'USDA' AND certification_date > '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM farm_practices WHERE farming_method_id = 3 AND crop_rotation_id = 5;
